mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_dept (dept_id, dept_name, parent_dept_id, dept_type, dept_description, teaching_flag, dept_order, creator, create_time, valid_flag,LEADER_FLAG) VALUES (#{deptId},#{deptName},#{parentDeptId},#{deptType},#{deptDescription},#{teachingFlag}, #{deptOrder},#{creator},sysdate,#{validFlag},#{leaderFlag})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_sys_dept d,t_rs_employee_dept ed WHERE d.dept_id = ed.dept_id AND ed.person_id = #{personId}
SELECT * FROM t_sys_dept d WHERE d.dept_type='8'

SELECT id, name, pid, isper1 AS isper, checked1 AS checked FROM ( SELECT dept_id id, dept_name || '(部门)' name, parent_dept_id pid, 'false' AS isper1, 'false' AS checked1 FROM t_sys_dept WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1' UNION ALL (SELECT t.*, nvl2(t3.id, 'true', 'false') AS checked1 FROM (SELECT t1.person_id id, t1.name name, t2.dept_id pid, 'true' AS isper1 FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE t1, T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT t2 ,t_sys_dept d WHERE t1.person_id = t2.person_id AND t1.VALID_FLAG = '1' AND d.VALID_FLAG = '1' AND t2.dept_id=d.dept_id ORDER BY t2.person_order ) t LEFT JOIN T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT_ROLE t3 ON t.id = t3.person_id AND t.pid = t3.dept_id AND t3.role_id = #{roleid} ) )
SELECT max(to_number(DEPT_ID)) FROM T_SYS_DEPT WHERE PARENT_DEPT_ID = #{pId}

SELECT DEPT_ID id,DEPT_NAME text FROM (SELECT DEPT_ID,DEPT_NAME FROM T_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID LIKE '%'||#{parentDeptId}||'%') WHERE DEPT_NAME=#{deptName} AND DEPT_ID!=#{deptId} AND DEPT_ID!=#{parentDeptId}
SELECT PERSON_ID FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = #{id}
SELECT dept_id id, dept_name name, parent_dept_id pid FROM t_sys_dept WHERE leader_flag = '1'
SELECT dept_id id, dept_name name, parent_dept_id pid FROM t_sys_dept t where t.teaching_flag = '1' ORDER BY parent_dept_id, dept_order
